top_comments.comment: All these years later I still find it absolutely hilarious seeing in huge letters "OH MY!"

The shining carpet and trike also appear in back 4 blood. I can't recall the mission name, but you have to save people in an apartment and their floor has the shining carpet and a trike in the corner.
7:50 I appreciate that after "meowing" their dialogue for over 20 seconds they kept in the voice actor cracking up at the end. XD

I remember trying out the Yoshi's Island trick after reading about it in a game magazine. I was not only shocked that the massive cheese worked, but that the developers put a custom cutscene and dialogue as well, I thought it was very amusing.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Being 40 years old, I take full credit for finding the SMW2 easter egg first. /s
